message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love it. If you don't buy it, I'll just have to sell it to someone else at the same price. The value of this product to you is significantly higher than the price, so it's a great deal. What do you say?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'll take it!
